resources.string: ReallySmartPhone
Sorry i did not get it, can you repeat it master

Hello I am Nala and I am here to help you use your smart phone.. Whenever you need me please tap the screen and tell me slow and clear what you want.. To ask for the menu of choices please tap and say "MENU"!
Ok! Please tell me the contact name.
Thats fine! Now tell me the contact number.
Who would you want me to call?
To whom would you like me to send message?
What date do you want the alarm to be set?
What hour do you want the alarm to be set?
What minutes do you want the alarm to be set?
I did not get it master,can you repeat it?
Ok master, i set the alarm at
What do you want me to send?
You have no messages, sorry for that master.
Your message hs been sent master
"I am so sorry. I could not find your contact master!"

However I need Internet in order to understand you. Right now your Internet connection is disabled. So please tap on screen twice in order to allow me enable it and make our conversation far more enjoyable!
Your contact is added!
To stop the music please say STOP
"I am so sorry master! I could not find songs in your phone
I am so sorry I cannot find a contact with this name! Please try again
"Your message is composed! I will make my best to deliver it!"

You have plenty of choices master! You can ask me to set an alarm for you, add you a contact, make a call, play music for you, tell you the date, tell you the time and even read or compose a message for you! Either case I will make my best to guide you enough and help you keep up with the process! Now that you know all my abilities you are ready to tap and talk to me!
You have
unread messages.
Your Wifi is enabled!
Please stay calm!
You are so unlucky today! I cannot call the police! I am really sorry master!
I could not understand the hour. Can you repeat it master?
I could not understand the minutes. Can you repeat it master?
You said
is that correct?
